name: Stickman's Killer Dash - The Best New Stickman Rush Death Race Runner Game (FREE)
name_original: Stickman's Killer Dash - The Best New Stickman Rush Death Race Runner Game (FREE)
description:
The ULTIMATE stick death race game. Escape from dangerous obstacles and run as far as you can in this addicting, simple endless runner game.

HOW TO PLAY

1) Tap the screen repeatedly to make Stickman run.

2) Watch out for dangerous saw blades!

3) Collect the coins to earn points and run as far as you can.

4) If you get hit by a saw, Stickman's days are over!
